entry.title: Xi Jinping's Endgame: A China Prepared for Conflict With the U.S.
entry.content: Over the past 10 years, Xi Jinping has unleashed an array of military, economic and political campaigns to brace the country for what he sees as the increasingly likely prospect of confrontation with the West.

entry.title: Marine Le Pen Wants France to Chart Its Own Course Between U.S. and Russia
entry.content: Though President Emmanuel Macron remains in control, his hard-right rival’s recent election gains have her rethinking France’s role on the global stage.

entry.title: Russia Urges Evacuation of Occupied Kherson, Steels for Ukrainian Advance
entry.content: Russian-installed officials in Ukraine’s south amplified calls for residents to leave as Kyiv’s forces step up their campaign to retake the region and Russia builds fortifications.

entry.title: India's Congress Party Ruled for Decades---Now It's on Life Support
entry.content: After a string of election defeats and defections to the ruling BJP, the party that governed India for nearly 60 years is looking to reinvent itself.
